for _ in range(input()):
  x=int(raw_input())
  i=1
  p=0
  while (p<=x):
    p=2**i +i
    i+=1
  #print i,p>x
  if(p>x):
    i-=2
    p=(2**i)+i
  #print i,p
  ps=abs(p-x)
  if (ps%2==0) and (ps<2**i):
    #print 'Yes'
    if (ps/2)%2==0:
      print 'LEFT'
    else:
      print 'RIGHT'
  else :
    print 'NO'
  #print i,ps,2**i
